评论详情: I'm a pretty standard US medium and this fit me like a crop top, well above my bellybutton. I would have gone two sizes larger if that were an option. I do have a long torso but the photos really look like it fits long on a model with a long torso. Not the case at all.  Otherwise fine. It's not so delicate that I worry about washing it in the machine or anything. About the quality I expected.
Not going to lie I thought this was going to be mad out of cheap material but it’s pretty good and it’s the right size! Overall I do recommend!
